title: Noob vs Cops
description: Noob vs Cops is an exhilarating survival game where you take on the role of Noob and must escape the relentless pursuit of zombie cops. Navigate your boat, dodge obstacles, and take down zombie cops. Collect points by gathering fish and crabs. Buy new weapons and upgrade your boat. With each thrilling mission, outsmart the zombie cops and become the ultimate pirate with your formidable pirate ship!
